original_text: So they shall wash their hands and their feet, that they die not: and it shall be a statute for ever to them, even to him and to his seed throughout their generations.
korean_text: 이와 같이 그들이 그 수족을 씻어 죽기를 면할지니 이는 그와 그의 자손이 대대로 영원히 지킬 규례니라

sentences.original_text: So they shall wash their hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 그들의 손을 씻어야 하고

sentences.original_text: and it shall be a statute for ever to them
even to him and to his seed
